title: Choice Husband
overview: Adapted from the novel "Liang Zhi Qian Fu Yi Tai Xi" (两只前夫一台戏) by Dian Xian (电线).Shen Mia is the daughter of the wealthiest man in Yangzhou City. Although she has wealth and beauty, no one dares marry her. Potential grooms consider her jinxed since two former fiancés ran away before their weddings. Shen Miao will meet a talented young scholar named Pei Yan Zhen, beginning a fantastic love story.
